row.Docu:
It sets general environmental variable(s) which can be further used in Jobs. It also changes the agent current directory to bin.
This Include object can be used for both Windows and Unix environment as per the Agent

row.process: : SET &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# = 0 :SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" @echo off SET CF_HOME=&UC4RB_CF_HOMEDIR# SET ERRORS=0 :CASE "UNIX" export CF_HOME=&UC4RB_CF_HOMEDIR# errors=0 :OTHER :ENDSWITCH :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
